items.content_html: Akari UI is a lightweight React.js component library built with Bootstrap. It provides a set of customizable and reusable components to accelerate your development process while maintaining a consistent design system

items.content_html: BugSpot is a lightweight widget that allows users to report issues directly from your website. It helps developers gather feedback with minimal friction, making it easier to identify and fix bugs.

items.content_html: NanoMD is a lightweight Markdown editing and viewing library built on pure JavaScript and native APIs. Can be easily embedded into websites, offers rich features, and supports real-time previewing.

items.content_html: File Upload Without Library in Next.js A simple Next.js project demonstrating how to handle file uploads without using any external libraries. It uses built-in functionality to manage file selection, uploading, and server-side handling, offering a lightweight, customizable solution.
items.title: mask-shakill/next.js-file-uploader: File Upload Without Library in Next.js A simple Next.js project demonstrating how to handle file uploads without using any external libraries. It uses built-in functionality to manage file selection, uploading, and server-side handling, offering a lightweight, customizable solution.

items.content_html: A lightweight and easy-to-use Minesweeper game library in JavaScript. Customize the grid size, mine count, and difficulty with minimal setup. Perfect for integrating Minesweeper into your web projects or for building your own game.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient REST API for managing blog posts, built with the Elysia framework. This project demonstrates how to set up a blog backend with Elysia and includes routes for creating, reading, updating, and deleting blog entries.
